name: Phantomas
overview: Phantomas comes from far away, from the Andromeda galaxy, it was programmed exclusively to steal and plunder. In the skin of Phantomas your challenge is to find a hidden treasure in the mansion of a millionaire. To do this you must first travel to the cloned planet Earth-Gamma and find the mansion, using space vehicles, airplanes and helicopters. Once in the mansion you have to avoid the traps, enemies and hidden dangers. Then you go to the underground world, where there are strange things locked in the crypts ... GOOD LUCK !!!
